Name: Death Dream
About the game: Death Dream - You find yourself in a galaxy with maps, on maps you can survive, build cities, extract resources, trade, defend against enemies, maps can be opened in a dream, when you make your bed and fall asleep, then you may dream of a quest, for example, a battle with a dragon, or dialogue with AI

Meta Description: Looking for information on Death Dream? Check out the release date (Jan 31, 2021), developer insights from Advanced Games, and a complete game summary.
